title: Won't let me purchase magic pen reds (tier 3)
body: Hey Riot! Glad you made all the tier 3 runes 10 IP each. So I've run into the problem that whenever I try to purchase tier 3 magic pen reds an error message pops up. I can purchase other runes, but for some reason only this one is giving me trouble

replies.body: If you're receiving an unknown error while attempting to purchase Tier 3 runes, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'd like to investigate this further while working with you directly to get this resolved.  See you there!
I think I managed to get all the runes I needed! Just wanted to thank you (and all the other riot employees) for bringing all this new stuff into the game! Pretty excited for the new season
Hey, thanks for reporting this!  So I can understand the situation better, what is the error saying?  Do you have a screenshot handy?

It's saying 

An error has occured.
Unable to purchase item: Unknown error

I'll try to get a screen shot give me a minute.

Edit: http://imgur.com/a/EF9Y6
Thanks, looking into this for you now.  In the meantime, have you restarted your client and tried again?
